title: Targeted abilities that should be dodgeable, based on Rek'sai's ult:
body:
The flavor of these abilities is that the champions are dashing or leaping to the target. They should not be able to change direction in mid-air, or have the effects follow the target if they are out of melee range when it lands.

{{champion:28}} E
{{champion:120}} E
{{champion:24}} Q
{{champion:80}} W
{{champion:78}} E
{{champion:107}} Passive
{{champion:91}} Q
{{champion:19}} Q
{{champion:62}} E
{{champion:5}} E
{{champion:157}} E

These are all targeted abilities that move the champion using them to or beyond their target, and deal damage when they reach the target. If the target flashes while the champion is in the middle of the dash, but before they make contact, the effect and damage should be negated, similar to what happens if you flash just as {{champion:421}} comes out of the ground with her ultimate.

Rek'sai's ult requires setup and... well it's her ULTIMATE ability. If it can be dodged, surely BASIC abilities that are simply point-and-click, require no setup, and in some cases come paired with a CC effect, should be.

Flashing while Warwick is dashing towards you with his Q (but before he makes contact) should NOT teleport him to your location. He is not a magical ninja, he is a wolf pouncing on his prey.

replies.body:
If jax was using his e while using his q it would still make sense.
https://airbus-h.assetsadobe2.com/is/image/content/dam/products-and-solutions/commercial-helicopters/h135/1300ste_H135.jpg?wid=1920&fit=fit,1&qlt=85,0
Ahahaha, OK I suppose we can make an exception. You know... for the meme.
Fizz q is dodgeable by blinks or speedsters like Jhin
And it does no damage if you avoid it that way? Or does the damage go through but Fizz is no longer in range to follow up?
You dodge the damage

Ah! Well then me dumb me change.

...

me split bot
Poppy’s E is dodge able actually. Though it requires timing.

I've flashed behind Poppy as she dashed towards me with her E, and I still get moved, but it's as though she's pulling me along behind her with some magical force, and not slamming into me and shoving me in front of her.

I’ve had numerous people dodging poppy E. Hell, I’ve seen Fizz do it without his troll pole.

It’s generally down to ability lag.
I don't doubt it's possible, and I believe you've seen it, but I haven't.
Its rare I’ll admit. The timing and situations have to be right because it’s abusing something not intended.
Would you say it's easy enough to do to be worth trying? (I.e.: worth flashing if you know that she can kill you if she lands her stun?)
If you’re trying to survive, it’s rarely not worth this risk of trying.
Fair enough ^^

{{champion:78}} player here. E is dodgeable, and pretty easy. Dont flash toward Poppy, but away from the wall you are about to get stunned by, and away from Poppy. (Flash when Poppy already started the dash.)

Im fairly sure thats how it works, never really thought about it in depth. But lets say Poppy is ganking and she starts her dash to stun on the wall, you just flash toward the direction you are running away.

If you go toward her it still hits you if you go away you dodge it.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aewCHdcqWJM

The fight is not as intense as the title would let you believe but the interaction I am talking about is at around 40s in. This works with any dash or flash.

Your dash just has to make it past the point where she stops her charge but if you go sideways and slightly toward her it still hits you.

You touched her model. You can't flash into her model so flashing BEHIND her will touch the back of her model. You can flash away from her model and you wont be hit. For example flash backwards, you'll be fine. You can also use any other type of blink/dash. As someone who plays Poppy support you can notice it most vs Ezreal because of essence flux.

One major feature of Warwicks Q is to be able to follow enemy movement with it to stick to them. Making it dodgable would seem a bit odd in this case...

And Warwick needs that feature imo. He doesn't have as much in combat mobility as other divers to stick to his target.
Fair enough, but it still makes no sense.
He literally attaches to the victim, his jaw is locked onto your body. That's the flavor.

Wait how much MS does he get chasing damage targets? And you're saying he needs help sticking to people...

Oof...

> [{quoted}](name=WeAreTheRatClan,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1cqsyLhj,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2018-10-27T23:34:20.318+0000)
>
> Wait how much MS does he get chasing damage targets? And you're saying he needs help sticking to people...
> 
> Oof...

Oof guy says in combat mobility you go on about Warwick out of combat boost which which isnt "sticking power".
Also any damage ability or spell will stop his w passive movespeed.

He just gets the movement speed if he is out of combat.
So this is no in fight mobility. This is just mobility that helps him go into the fight, but when he is already in the fight, the movementspeed is gone and he could get kited quite easily without his Q.
Yes, because everyone starts fights at half health.
Usually people say they want Flash to be LESS mandatory as a spell, not more.
Flash is not the only blink in the game.

Stuff like Hec's E, Rengo's passive, and (I think) Eve's E is that those are all empowered Autos and are coded as such. Only way to dodge an auto is to become untargetable, which is not the same as moving from the spot.

Warwick's Q is specifically stated that it follows you so it doesn't make sense that you would be able to dodge it.

Everyone else I don't have an answer for
Kalista is crying

the fact u even have anyone agreeing with you i find disgraceful

i used to LOVE to play {{champion:421}} , she is the champ who changed my main role from mid to jungle.

and i absolutely hate with a passion how the completely ruined everything about her that i loved.

 in the process they made her ultimate a complete fucking joke... a point and click ability that can miss... on an ultimate.

it was absolutely disgraceful.

no other champion in the game... even if i hate them dserved to be gutted and ruined in the way {{champion:421}}  was.

 this thread is disgusting.. the the people up-voting it are disgusting

 the counterplay isnt to "dodge the point and click ability" ther counterplay it to be _alive_ after the point and click ability


like seriously does no NO ONE remember dodge {{champion:24}} 

i mean its need like 3 patches since {{champion:24}}  was the most oppressive champion in the game because of his  E.

 have people already forgotten how toxic that kind of thing is to deal with.

 auto attacks and point and click abilities should not be dodge-able. ( obvious if it makes an aoe like a lux E or {{champion:555}} /{{champion:89}}  ulti thats different from a single target point and click) like {{champion:421}}  ulti is

that's is behind stupid.. and i will not support any other champ.. not even  {{champion:223}} {{champion:35}}  have to deal with that shit
I disagree with {{champion:19}} 's Q. That ability is literally meant for you to stick onto your target. Even holding it down lets you follow them if they try to dash away.
Yasuo E doesnt deal damage if you flash out of it
yes it does...

I mained Yasuo from release to season 7
I know for a fact that it doesn't deal damage when flashed out of 
However Riot recently rescripted his E when Odyssey came out so if it is dealing damage when flashed out of, then that's only a recent thing

@thread
To be honest, "semi-skill shots" should include all projectiles. including ranged basic attacks. Ranged basic attacks should be both interceptable by all AND dodgeable.

FUN FACTS : 

you can actually dodge graves auto
you can also dodge twitch's ult by flashing out of the way

> [{quoted}](name=me trynd u lose,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1cqsyLhj,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-10-27T18:24:15.065+0000)
>
> The flavor of these abilities is that the champions are dashing or leaping to the target. They should not be able to change direction in mid-air, or have the effects follow the target if they are out of melee range when it lands.

No to all of them.

> These are all targeted abilities that move the champion using them to or beyond their target, and deal damage when they reach the target. If the target flashes while the champion is in the middle of the dash, but before they make contact, the effect and damage should be negated, similar to what happens if you flash just as {{champion:421}} comes out of the ground with her ultimate.

No, because several of them are designed to chase after you.

> 
> Rek&#039;sai&#039;s ult requires setup and... well it&#039;s her ULTIMATE ability. If it can be dodged, surely BASIC abilities that are simply point-and-click, require no setup, and in some cases come paired with a CC effect, should be.

It is why people hate it.
It i an ult ability that requires set up but is rather easily dodged.

> 
> Flashing while Warwick is dashing towards you with his Q (but before he makes contact) should NOT teleport him to your location. He is not a magical ninja, he is a wolf pouncing on his prey.

It should let him cjase your flash vecause that is how it was intended to function.
In defense of {{champion:107}}, his leap is a basic attack that merely gained range and causes him to move to a specific location. It's not a targeted ability and isn't coded like one.

You forgot Evelynn's Demon Shade E, as it also pulls her to her target.

But it's funny, as it should be the other way around, that you can dodge basic abilities by dashing/flashing at the right time and now Rek'sai's ult, not the other way around XD
Doesn't eve`s tentacle attach to her target and pull her to said target though. It seems to make sense in a way.
Does it? I'll be honest here, Eve is one of the champions I haven't checked out ;) since her rework. I'll add her to the list.
Yes, and you should mention that it's the Shaded E, not basic E. Basic E is just a normal hit, Empowered E deals more damage and drags her.

Talon Q, no. Its like Lee Sin Q. Its not a straight linear dash and doesn't behave like one. 
Same with Warwick. his whole thing about ti is how it is literally build to follow you.

pretty sure Yasuo E is already dodge-able.

Evelynn is odd, her E functions similarly to Warwick Q but it requires better timing, basically she'll follow you even if you blink or dash so long as she used her E at the same time or so long as her little lasher's are on your champion. 

However based on my experience with Evelynn her E can be dodged but it's extremely difficult, you basically have to preemptively flash before her Lasher's make contact with you, dashes will not work. I don't think it works the same with Warwick Q because it's meant to be easier to land the ability, but i could understand letting the player flash at the start of the animation and having warwick fail his Q, very good timing is required on both player's part and forcing out flash is definitely worth it in my opinion.

Edit: They attempted to show the Evelynn+Blink interaction in her release trailer but kind of failed so it's a little known interaction(as i said the timing for evelynn to follow you is pretty precise)

Well {{champion:80}} is kind of the opposite, where instead of dodging it, you can interrupt it.
So long as he doesn't land, he doesn't stun. Either via a knock up or displacement.

The reason rek’sai’s ult is dodgable is that the damaging part is a fixed length targeted dash
Riot has decided all fixed length targeted dashes should be be dodge-able
This includes {{champion:105}}‘s Q {{champion:12}}‘s knock back and {{champion:157}}’s dash
Idk why
Cow W and Rek'Sai R are not fixed length dashes. Their length varies in order to reach the target. Fizz and Yasuo are valid though.

The damaging part of rek'sai's ult is a fixed length dash in front of and behind the target calculated during the untargetable part.
Ali's W is a fixed length set when you press the button.
It's a dumb way to code them and I'm part of the "if I can't aim why can you dodge?" Group so I'm not happy about it but that's the way it is
Rengars passive is a auto attack range increase, not an ability.
Eve's already been dumped on the past two patches.  no more pls
Or... make Rek'sai's ult undodgeable... nvm, I can already sense the downvotes.
